text: Hi all, Just a quick update that we've added a find and replace toolbar in the code editor of the new design manager. We've updated this blog post to include some more information on this update <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/keyboard-shortcuts-for-cms-development-efficiencies>.
<@U87NGNETZ> any word on Copy down or copy up?
Hi Chad. That is still in the works.
Out of curiosity, do many people here use Vim keybindings?
I stay as far away from VIM as possible. Although i know a certain dev in our office that loves vim.
Awesome! Much better find/replace experience than I had yesterday :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm getting errors when trying to use the new Icon picker. When I copy and paste the snippet, DM is telling me:
InterpretException: Can't find icon '{{ module.box.icon.name }}' in set 'fontawesome-5'
InterpretException: Invalid style value '{{ module.box.icon.type }}'. Possible values are: SOLID, REGULAR, LIGHT
Hey! I can take a look at that. Could you give me the specific Icon you tried selecting? Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
I selected the Amazon icon as a placeholder.
Hey I'm all good! I realized I had it in a group but then didn't have the stuff inside a loop. Once I fixed that the error went away
Ok great! If any other issues come up let me know
Yeah, how do I change size/color? The FA documentation says that SVG icons automatically inherit CSS but it seems to be ignoring mine.
The ability to change color hasnâ€™t been added yet but is something we plan on adding. As for size, you can add `height` and `width` properties to the icon directly (i.e. `height="50" width="50"`)
